means: 同族的人，族人，同宗的人

sentence.Network_en: Mongolian costume is mark which has the cohesion function for the clansman.
sentence.Network_cn: 蒙古族服饰是蒙古族的族徽,它对族人有凝聚力的作用.

sentence.Network_en: Then complete clansman wears business suit, make tie, await that momently arrival.
sentence.Network_cn: 于是全族人都穿西装, 打领带, 等待那一刻的到来.

sentence.Network_en: This is not a wild man thinking, just a belongingness toward my clansman.

entry.def: Clansmen are people who are members of the same clan .
